messages.message:
*Sharing Instabase AI Hub apps that you create!*
Confirming that I can successfully share an app on prod and run it with another account. In case anyone wants to try it, here's (probably) the first shared app on prod to Process Flight Tickets with Instabase AI Hub (https://aihub.instabase.com/hub/apps/dabb94ae-220c-45d6-8f60-3267a43cdb55) :airplane: :share:  More to come once the release settles down about promoting the feature. For now, would love your feedback. You can share any apps you've created using the share button on the app page.

The main thing that feels jarring at the moment is opening a link to the shared app on mobile and getting a 404. 

For now, we can request people sharing apps to mention to receivers that they should open the app on desktop. But this hurts potential virality.

But could we quickly create a variation of this page to say that apps are not supported on mobile and they should come back on desktop for the next release? @Travis
Assign a ticket to me to handle next week.
